'''Ghân''' was the father of the famous leader of the [[Third Age]] [[Drúedain]], [[Ghân-buri-Ghân]], obviously derived from his own name.<ref>{{PE|17}}, p. 99</ref>

==Examples==
* [[Ghân-buri-Ghân]] ("Ghân son of Ghân"; ''Ghân'' + ''[[buri]]'')
